name: Arrow Song II
summary: " Arrow Song 2" is an archery game with the historical background of Qin Shihuang's unification of China. Throughout the ten years of Qin's unification, there were 19 major battles. The game will lead players back to the magnificent Warring States Period, to experience Qin Shihuang's ambition to unify the six kingdoms, to conquer all corners of the country, and to write his own legend.
